item.planetaitemsmod.adamant_orb.descrip: A brightly gleaming orb to be held by Dialga. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Steel-type moves.
item.planetaitemsmod.aurora_ticket.descr: A ticket required to board the ship to Birth Island.
item.planetaitemsmod.azure_flute.descrip: A flute that emits a clear tone that summons Arceus to the Sinjoh Ruins.
item.planetaitemsmod.blue_orb.descriptio: A shiny blue orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It's known to have a deep connection with the Hoenn region.
item.planetaitemsmod.bonus_disk.descript: A mysterious disk with unknown content.
item.planetaitemsmod.clear_bell.descript: A very old-fashioned bell that makes a gentle ringing.
item.planetaitemsmod.dna_splicer.descrip: A splicer that fuses Kyurem and a certain Pokémon together.
item.planetaitemsmod.eon_ticket.descript: A ticket required for sailing on a ferry to the Southern Island.
item.planetaitemsmod.griseous_orb.descri: A glowing orb to be held by Giratina. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Ghost-type moves.
item.planetaitemsmod.gs_ball.description: A mysterious Poké Ball. It has something to do with the Mythical Pokémon Celebi.
item.planetaitemsmod.jade_orb.descriptio: A shiny green orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It's known to have a deep connection with the Johto region.
item.planetaitemsmod.liberty_pass.descri: A pass to go to Liberty Garden. Board the ship in Castelia City.
item.planetaitemsmod.lustrous_orb.descri: A beautifully glowing orb to be held by Palkia. It boosts the power of Dragon- and Water-type moves.
item.planetaitemsmod.member_card.descrip: An odd card which is needed to enter the Inn in Canalave City.
item.planetaitemsmod.oaks_letter.descrip: A letter from Professor Oak. Written in it is a request for you to go to Route 224.
item.planetaitemsmod.old_sea_map.descrip: A chart that can be used to navigate to Faraway Island, where Mew is said to reside.
item.planetaitemsmod.red_orb.description: A shiny red orb that is said to have a legend tied to it. It's known to have a deep connection with the Hoenn region.
item.planetaitemsmod.rusted_shield.descr: It is said that a hero used this shield to halt a terrible disaster in ancient times. But it's grown rusty and worn.
item.planetaitemsmod.rusted_sword.descri: It is said that a hero used this sword to halt a terrible disaster in ancient times. But it's grown rusty and worn.
item.planetaitemsmod.tidal_bell.descript: A bell capable of summoning Lugia from the depths of the Whirl Islands when rung.
item.planetaitemsmod.dr_fujis_diary.desc: Dr. Fuji's diary, filled with records of his research on Mew and the resulting creation of Mewtwo.
item.planetaitemsmod.rainbow_wing.descri: A strange feather that gleams in rainbow colors.
item.planetaitemsmod.scarlet_book.descri: A record of the expedition that the author, Heath, went on within the Great Crater of Paldea. The book has the name “Sada” written on it in clumsy handwriting.
item.planetaitemsmod.silver_wing.descrip: A strange feather that gleams with a silvery color.
item.planetaitemsmod.violet_book.descrip: A record of the expedition that the author, Heath, went on within the Great Crater of Paldea. The book has the name “Turo” written on it in clumsy handwriting.
item.planetaitemsmod.cocoon_of_destructi: A mysterious item that holds the power of destruction.
item.planetaitemsmod.sapling_of_life.des: A magical sapling embodying the essence of life.
item.planetaitemsmod.zygarde_cube.descri: An item in which Zygarde Cores and Cells are gathered.
